channel.title: Bluesky on Deuts Log
channel.description: Recent content in Bluesky on Deuts Log

item.title: @deuts.hamili.net 3ldfbpagp7s2s
item.description: I’m contemplating whether I should get an Apple TV or not. Any compelling reason why I should do so? I already have Google Chromecast with Google TV and Onn 4K. The Onn device is so buggy I though I could use an Apple TV in its stead.
item.content:encoded: I’m contemplating whether I should get an Apple TV or not. Any compelling reason why I should do so? I already have Google Chromecast with Google TV and Onn 4K. The Onn device is so buggy I though I could use an Apple TV in its stead.

item.title: @deuts.hamili.net 3lddvjqge4k2r
item.description: Am I the only one downloading media (movies and TV shows) for #Plex or #Jellyfin at only 720p in 2024?
item.content:encoded: Am I the only one downloading media (movies and TV shows) for #Plex or #Jellyfin at only 720p in 2024?

item.title: @deuts.hamili.net 3lddb2k5mas2r
item.description:
Tududi - A Minimalist, Open-Source Task and Project Management Tool github.com/∞

My wish for this is a notification for overdue tasks via Gotify, Telegram or email.
item.content:encoded:

item.title: @deuts.hamili.net 3lda5uolrak2w
item.description: For me I’m waiting around here for #Bluesky and #ATProto to mature and excited to try out all the cool features to come in the future, especially for those who have their own PDS instance like me.
item.content:encoded: For me I’m waiting around here for #Bluesky and #ATProto to mature and excited to try out all the cool features to come in the future, especially for those who have their own PDS instance like me.

item.title: @deuts.hamili.net 3lda5bcbgck2w
item.description: Why does it always have to be #Mastodon vs. #Bluesky? They can co-exist, you and your friends can sign up to both.
item.content:encoded: Why does it always have to be #Mastodon vs. #Bluesky? They can co-exist, you and your friends can sign up to both.

item.title: @deuts.hamili.net 3ld77mskf6c2x
item.description: The chess world champions list. Of course missing in this list are Khalifman, Ponomariov, Khasimdzhanov, and Topalov. That’s how chaotic the chess world has been in the 90’s to 2000’s.
item.content:encoded: The chess world champions list. Of course missing in this list are Khalifman, Ponomariov, Khasimdzhanov, and Topalov. That’s how chaotic the chess world has been in the 90’s to 2000’s.
